title: Sun Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting your twelfth house shifts attention toward inner life, withdrawal, and subtle self-awareness. External recognition feels less important as reflection, rest, and behind-the-scenes efforts take priority. You may feel the need to step back from constant visibility and reassess motivations, authority, and ego patterns. Expenses related to isolation, healing, or distant matters can rise. When handled consciously, this transit strengthens inner authority, spiritual maturity, and clarity through solitude rather than spotlight.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Ego softens through solitude and awareness.
Need for rest and retreat increases.

sections.heading: Career
points: Less focus on recognition, more on completion.
Preparation sets foundation for next cycle.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Desire for privacy in connections increases.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses on healing, travel, or isolation rise.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Need for silence and mental rest.

closing: The Sun in the 12th house closes a cycle through reflection. By honoring solitude and release, inner strength prepares you for renewed visibility ahead.
